definition: ecstasy/rapture/to feel overwhelming joy or sorrow
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body

sentences.english: It was the most insanely erotic moment of Howell’s life.
sentences.chinese: 那是豪厄爾一生當中最爲瘋狂銷魂的片刻時光。

sentences.english: Enjoy it and may it make you a more amazing lover!
sentences.chinese: 好好學習這本書吧，它會讓你成爲一個銷魂的愛人的。

sentences.english: Mary bewitched him with her smile.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗以她的微笑令他銷魂。

sentences.english: Get this right and your partner will soon be writhing around in ecstasy.
sentences.chinese: 把握好這一要點的話，她很快就會銷魂的盡情扭動了。

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
